name: 10% Off Coupon
description: Get 10% off your total bill on your next visit.

name: Free Appetizer
description: Enjoy one free appetizer with your meal.

name: Buy 1 Get 1 Free Main Course
description: Buy one main course and get another of equal or lesser value free.

name: Free Dessert Coupon
description: Claim a free dessert with any order over $20.

name: 15% Off Weekend Special
description: Enjoy 15% off your meal on weekends only.

name: $20 Gift Card
description: Receive a $20 gift card valid for any future purchase.

name: VIP Early Access to New Menu
description: Get early access to try out our new seasonal menu before public release.

name: Free Coffee for a Month
description: Enjoy one free coffee every day for a month.

name: Exclusive Chef's Special Dish
description: A complimentary exclusive dish specially crafted by our head chef.

name: Priority Reservation Service
description: Get priority seating and reservation at peak hours.
